metadata.title: CVE-2017-0861 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the snd_pcm_info function in the ALSAsubsystem in the Linux kernel allows attackers to gain privileges viaunspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-10-generic - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-4.15.0-10-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-4.15.0-10-lowlatency - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-extra-4.15.0-10-generic - 4.15.0-10.11
No subscription required

No subscription required
